items.title: One-Click Generation
items.description: Convert any X post into a beautiful share card with just one click. No complex setup required.

items.title: Multiple Themes & Layouts
items.description: Choose from various themes (Light/Dark) and layouts (Grid, Masonry, Stacked Cards, Collage) to match your style.

items.title: Copy to Clipboard

steps.title: Install Extension
steps.description: Install X Snap from Chrome Web Store or load it in developer mode.

steps.title: Open X (Twitter)
steps.description: Navigate to X (Twitter) website and find the tweet you want to convert.

steps.title: Click the Scissors Icon
steps.description: Click the scissors icon button that appears on the tweet to open the card generator.

steps.title: Customize Your Card
steps.description: Choose your preferred theme, layout, and content options in the popup window.

steps.title: Copy or Download
steps.description: Click copy to clipboard or download as PNG, then share it on your favorite platform.

items.question: How do I install the extension?
items.answer: You can install X Snap from the Chrome Web Store. If it's not yet available, you can load it in developer mode by downloading the extension files and enabling developer mode in Chrome's extension settings.

items.question: Which browsers are supported?
items.answer: Currently, X Snap is available for Chrome and other Chromium-based browsers like Edge, Brave, and Opera. Support for Firefox and Safari is planned for future releases.

items.question: What is the image quality of generated cards?
items.answer: X Snap generates high-quality images at @2x resolution, ensuring crisp and clear share cards that look great on all devices and platforms.

items.question: Does it support Chinese tweets?
items.answer: Yes! X Snap has full support for Chinese text rendering, including proper font handling and text layout for Chinese characters.

items.question: Can I customize the card style?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can choose from multiple themes (Light/Dark), layouts (Grid, Masonry, Stacked Cards, Collage), and toggle various content elements like statistics, QR codes, and comments.

items.question: What are the QR codes for?
items.answer: X Snap automatically generates two QR codes: one at the top linking to the original tweet, and one at the bottom linking to the extension download page, making it easy for others to find and install the extension.

items.question: Is X Snap free?
items.answer: Yes, X Snap is currently free to use, and the vast majority of features will remain free. We are planning to introduce a Pro version in the future that will offer additional premium features for advanced users. The core functionality will always be available for free.

items.question: How is my data privacy protected?
items.answer: X Snap processes most data locally in your browser. When generating QR codes, only the tweet URL is sent to the QR code service provider to create the code. No other tweet content, images, or personal information is transmitted to external servers. Your privacy is our top priority.
